subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] This is maybe the best image.
author: Lynn burton
full_text:

I have to agree with you on this one.  That is pretty impressive.  What configuration are you using.  I have done some video work using the continuous loop idea of recording the television screen showing the same television screen that I was recording, if that makes any sense. 
   
  Lynn

Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:
          A face of woman in a black background. Now this one impresses even me. 
 
 It's a bit frustrating to be excited all to hell about something and nobody cares!
 
 Frank-S
